text: læa khea (xi brxhim) klaw wa thæcring phwk than di yud xea rup pan tang «xun ca kxallxhˌ pheux hı pen thirak khır rahwang phwk than nı chiwit hæng lok ni læw nı wan ki ya mahˌ bang khnnı hmu phwk than k ca ptiseth xik bang khn læa bang khnnı hmu phwk than k ca chæng da xik bang khn læa thi phanak khxng phwk than khux fi læa sahrab phwk than ca mimi phu chwyhelux
